name: Super Bitly Blast
description:
Super Bitly Blast was once the prime of game design- until a malicious virus known as W.A.R.D.E.N infects the once esteemed game cartridge. Play as Bitly himself, shooting your way through several levels of puzzle solving corridor action to fight back against the vile virus and save the game. 

Fix the broken circuit boards by shooting your Data Blaster at CORRUPTED resistors and chips to repair them. This will change their state from RED to GREEN. Once all corrupt components are repaired, use the green telepad to warp to the next level!

Look out for the WARDENS- though weak, their Spawners can definitely overwhelm any player not managing their ammo and health.

____________________________________

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT

    use WASD to move.

AIMING

    use mouse to aim.

SHOOTING

    use Left mouse OR Spacebar to shoot.

*No longer compatible with 4th Dimensional VR units.
